General.Name: Ruchira Papers Limited
General.Description: Ruchira Papers Limited manufactures and sells paper and paper products in India and internationally. The company offers white writing and printing papers that are used for fabrication notebooks and writing materials; and colored papers used in the fabrication of spiral notebooks, wedding cards, shade cards, children's coloring books, bill books, etc. It also provides Kraft papers for the fabrication of corrugated boxes, composite cans, fiber drums, textile cones/ream wrappers, food packaging, and other packaging requirements; and manufactures copier paper for office and stationery, and cupstock papers for beverages. The company was incorporated in 1980 and is based in Yamuna Nagar, India.
General.Address: 21-22, New Professors Colony, Yamuna Nagar, India, 135001
